metadata.title: CVE-2020-10959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: resources/src/mediawiki.page.ready/ready.js in MediaWiki before 1.35 allowsremote attackers to force a logout and external redirection via HTMLcontent in a MediaWiki page.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
